divs: Sighting Detailsas i was driving to work out in the uinta and ouray oil feild i notested a bright light in the sky as i watched it it had faded out to nothing this took 40sc then illuminated back to being real bright this all so took 40sc the color of this light was a yellow ish this shape was triagular as if u took 3 balls and put them together i could not see the center du to the bright light but i could see the outer edge the hight of this object was in the atmustfr it was south east south east all so it was clear skys i all so called my co worker on the CB he all so was driving i told him to look up to see if he could see it he said yes . so we got tired of looking at it so we whent to work :)
